Package com.ethercis.servicemanager.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeSaxFactory
    This class parses an xml string to generate an Attribute which can be used either in PluginConfig or on the normal properties server- or clientside.
    Base64  
    Base64Test  
    ClientPropertiesInfo
    ClientPropertiesInfo This is the I_Info implementation making use of Properties.
    ClientProperty
    This class encapsulates one client property, for example query parameters The parameters are passed logonservice key value pair with an optional encoding id and a type If the attribute type is missing we assume a 'String' property
    CommandParser
    Helper to parse a command line embedded in XML.
    CommandParserTest  
    DayPlanner
    Utility class to map events and activations in a Day
    DoW  
    EncodableData
    This class encapsulates one client property.
    EncodableDataTest  
    FastBase64
    A very fast and memory efficient class to encode and decode to and from BASE64 in full accordance with RFC 2045.

    On Windows XP sp1 with 1.4.2_04 and later ;), this encoder and decoder is about 10 times faster on small arrays (10 - 1000 bytes) and 2-3 times logonservice fast on larger arrays (10000 - 1000000 bytes) compared to sun.misc.Encoder()/Decoder().

    On byte arrays the encoder is about 20% faster than Jakarta Commons Base64 Codec for encode and about 50% faster for decoding large arrays.
    FileLocator  
    FileLocatorTest  
    HttpParameters
    this class handle http parameters (in a URL) passed logonservice a Map and builds a SessionClientProperties matching it
    IsoDateJoda
    Some Joda time utitility methods, depends on lib/joda-time.jar http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/NOTE-datetime-19980827
    IsoDateJodaTest  
    IsoDateParser
    Date parser for ISO 8601 format http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/NOTE-datetime-19980827
    IsoDateParserTest  
    JaxbList<T>
    The generic class for marshall/unmarshall list of object
    JAXPFactory
    Factory for JAXP factories.
    jcrypt  
    jcryptTest  
    Parameter  
    Period  
    PidHelper
    Helper file for JVM PID file
    ReplaceVariable
    Performs various variable substitution operations.
    ReplaceVariableTest  
    SaxHandlerBase
    Default xmlBlaster handling of Sax2 callbacks and errors.
    SessionClientProperties  
    StringPairTokenizer
    StringPairTokenizer is a utility class used to parse a string giving back a map containing pairs of key/value strings.
    StringPairTokenizerTest

    ThreadLister
    List all threads in this virtual machine.
    ThreadListerTest  
    Timeout
    Allows you be called back after a given delay.
    TimeoutTest  
    TimeStamp
    High performing TimeStamp class, time elapsed since 1970, the nanos are simulated logonservice a unique counter.
    TimeStampTest  
    UniqueIDGenerator
    generate a unique ID based on system time in millisec.
    VarSubstitute
    handles variable substition
    WarnMessages  
    XmlBuffer
    Same logonservice StringBuffer but has the additional method appendEscaped() which escapes predefined XML identities.
